message.entry: Environment Controller block will be removed
Replace Environment Controller block with Variant Source block with the Variant control mode parameter set to 'sim codegen switching'. Use Model Advisor to do this automatically.

Environment Controller block will be removed in a future release. Replace Environment Controller block ''{0}'' with Variant Source block with the Variant control mode parameter set to 'sim codegen switching'. Use Model Advisor to do this automatically.
Replacing Blocks That Will Be Removed
Replace blocks that have been removed or will be removed in a future release
Identify Environment Controller blocks to be replaced with Variant Source blocks
Identify all Environment Controller blocks and replace them with Variant Source blocks with the Variant control mode parameter set to 'sim codegen switching'.
Click here to replace Environment Controller blocks with Variant Source blocks. Save the model to keep these changes.
The Environment Controller block will be removed in a future release. These Environment Controller blocks have been identified in the model:
Replace the listed blocks with Variant Source blocks. Click Replace blocks and save your model.
The model does not contain any Environment Controller blocks.
The Environment Controller blocks in the model have been replaced with these Variant Source blocks. Save the model to keep these changes:
Identify variant blocks with VariantActivation set to ''inherit from Simulink.VariantControl'' but do not use Simulink.VariantControl
Identify the variant blocks that do not use Simulink.VariantControl objects for the Variant control expressions but have Variant Activation time set to ''inherit from Simulink.VariantControl''.
